/api/users: GET responds with all users, POST adds a user
/api/users/:username: GET responds with a specified user
/api/topics: GET responds with all topics, POST adds a topic
/api/articles: GET responds with all articles, POST adds an article
/api/articles:article_id: GET responds with a specified article, PATCH updates a specified articles VOTE count, DELETE deltes a specified article
/api/articles/:article_id/comments: GET responds with all comments in specified article, POST adds a comment to specified article
/api/comments/:comment_id: PATCH updates specified comment VOTE count, DELETE deletes a specified comment
